ComicInfo.Summary:
The Crisis Command, last survivors of the multiverse, are faced with an impossible task: avenging the death...of an idea! DOA is EMPATHY ITSELF, and while empathy withers and dies across the world, Originator uses her abilities to bring the John Doe back for 24 hours to reveal the name of his killer!
*List of covers and their creators:* | Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | |-------|-----------------------------------------|--------------|------------------| | A | Cover A | Davide Tinto | 1-2 | | B | Cover B | Paul Harding | 3 | | C | Cover C | Laura Braga | 4 | | D | 1:10 Retailer Incentive Variant Cover D | Brett Booth | 5 | | E | 1:25 Retailer Incentive Variant Cover E | Joe Quinones | 6 |
ComicInfo.Title: The Action of Resurrection
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Brett Booth,Davide Tinto,Joe Quinones,Laura Braga,Paul Harding
